events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car at an intersection, immediately filing the claim for the accident.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident after confirming keywords related to vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the vehicle accident claim to ensure rapid processing.
The claim acknowledgement was sent to the customer, confirming receipt and next steps in their auto accident case.
The customer was asked to provide police reports, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates.
All requested documents including accident reports and vehicle damage images were submitted by the policyholder.
The investigation team began analyzing the submitted documents and assessing the vehicle damage for the accident.
After thorough review, the investigation into the auto accident claim was completed with clear fault determination.
A settlement proposal reflecting repair costs and rental car coverage was communicated to the claimant.
The customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and timely claim handling.
Formal approval of the auto accident claim was granted, enabling processing of the settlement payment.
The settlement payment was issued to cover vehicle repairs and additional incurred costs as agreed.
The claim case was officially closed following successful payment and no further issues reported by the customer.
All documentation and claim history related to the auto accident were archived securely for future reference.
